products.product_brief_description: The iPhone 13 offers a sleek design, an A15 Bionic chip, and improved battery life with dual-camera setup.
products.product_description: With a 6.1-inch OLED display and advanced camera features, the iPhone 13 delivers exceptional performance for everyday use and professional-grade photos.

products.product_brief_description: The iPhone 14 Pro features a 48MP main camera, 5G connectivity, and the powerful A16 Bionic chip.
products.product_description: Capture every moment with professional-grade photography, enjoy faster processing speeds, and experience a stunning 120Hz ProMotion display on the iPhone 14 Pro.

products.product_brief_description: The iPhone SE combines classic design with modern performance, powered by the A15 Bionic chip.
products.product_description: The iPhone SE offers a compact design with the latest chip technology, allowing you to enjoy fast performance and a 12MP camera at an affordable price.
